abstract: For some reason, people are using the site, houstoninteriorplants, more like a brochure than as an online retail store.  Can it — or should it — be fixed?
snippet: For some reason, people are using the site, houstoninteriorplants, more like a brochure than as an online retail store.  Can it — or should it — be fixed?
lead_paragraph: Greencare Interior Plants is a store in Houston that sells plants to residences and businesses. The company has long served the Houston area through its brick-and-mortar store but has only recently decided to try the world of e-commerce. Working with a minimal budget, Patrice Watine, the owner, built a Web site, houstoninteriorplants.com, with the hope that if he built it, they would come.

headline.main: Why Aren’t This Site’s Visitors Buying?
